summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4120 for the improvement of West 60th Street, from 32nd Avenue Northwest to a point approximately 400 feet west of 36th Avenue Northwest; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 49430, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
